attributes.action: Prohibit serving MPs of being members of foreign nation lobby groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to petition the Prime Minister to make it illegal for any British MP to be associated with any foreign political lobby groups or groups attempting to influence British Government policy.  British MPs are elected to serve the  British Citizens, they are not elected to serve the interests of foreign governments.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
